title: Up All Night: A Novel
description: When player-hating Natasha Madison decides to do her entrepreneurial girlfriend a solid by becoming an anonymous tester for a hot new online erotic-fantasies matchmaking service, she has no idea her true identity would be revealed. The Orchid Soul web site definitely has more than a few kinks that need to be worked out. Unchallenged by this opportunity, fellow tester Logan Taylor doesn't mind taking advantage of the unexpected turn of eventsâ€•although it's clear to Natasha that he's completely Mr. Wrong. Well, except that with each intimate fantasy they share, Logan sure feels more and more like Mr. Right.
author: Delilah Dawson
